'''''Citius, Altius, Fortius!''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to dig out the buried target mechanisms, without getting hit by the explosives in the daily [[Commission]] [[Grow Up Quickly, Littl'Un]].

==Trivia==
* The Latin phrase {{Lang|la=''Citius, Altius, Fortius''|la_tl=Faster, Higher, Stronger|mini=1}} was the original motto of the {{w|Olympic Games}}, In 2021, the International Olympic Committee revised it to be {{Lang|la=''Citius, Altius, Fortius – Communiter''|la_tl=Faster, Higher, Stronger – Together.|mini=1}}
